title: What is "Overview suggestions" in Pixel Launcher Home Settings?
content: When you tap and hold on the home screen of the default Pixel Launcher, you can then go into "Home Settings". There you'll find a toggle switch for "Overview suggestions". What exactly is that? I couldn't figure it out. I'm assuming Overview is the recent apps action, but I see no suggestions there.
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3 XL
